word: The heavenly gates are again to be lifted up, and with ten thousand times ten thousand and thousands of thousands of holy ones, our Saviour will come forth as "King of kings, and Lord of lords" (1 Timothy 6:15). Jehovah Immanuel "shall be king over all the earth: in that day shall there be one Lord, and his name one" (Zechariah 14:9). "The tabernacle of God is with men, and he shall dwell with them, . . . and be their God" (Revelation 21:3).
